name: Bobâ€™s French Onion Soup (Good)
ingredients: 3-4 large Vidalia onions sliced 1/2 in. wide
instructions: In 4 qt. pan over medium heat melt butter add onions, garlic and sugar for 10 minutes.
Stir in flour until well blended with the onions and juices.
Add water, wine, broth heat to boiling.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 10 minutes.
Toast in 325 oven until lightly browned about 10 minutes.
Ladle soup into oven safe bowls.
Place bread on top of soup.
Place cheese on bread in soup.
Bake at 425 for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted.
You can do this but skip the bread and cheese part.
